about_the_game:
A value set of rare crafting and beast materials that will come in handy from the beginning of the story.

Black Silver Sand x10
Sacred Wood x10
Bright Coral x10
Steel Bone x10
Everlasting Leather x10
Adamantine Bone x10

*Can also be obtained in-game.
*Open [DLC] under [Items] in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*Please note that all items in excess of the maximum amount will be lost.
